name: Tiles Fall
description:
1. "Tiles Fall" is a very simple and very interesting casual elimination game.
2. This game provides three modes: Survival mode, Topspeed mode and Endless mode.
3. Whichever game mode, the goal is the same: match two or more adjacent tiles of the same color to make them fall.
4. You need to use a certain strategy to make the number of adjacent and the same color tiles as much as possible, so that you can get higher scores.
5. Try it now! Test your overall layout ability.
